attributes.action: Give all secondary school students a talk about the impact of animal products
attributes.additional_details:
Details which should be covered:

The environmental impact of animal agriculture, including greenhouse gas emissions, land usage and water pollution.

The exploitation of animals for the production of meat, dairy and eggs.

A couple of links which focus on environmental impact:

https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2018/may/31/avoiding-meat-and-dairy-is-single-biggest-way-to-reduce-your-impact-on-earth

http://theconversation.com/five-ways-the-meat-on-your-plate-is-killing-the-planet-76128
attributes.background: I propose that all secondary school students should be given a talk which covers a) the impact which animal agriculture has on the environment and b) the role of animals in the production of meat, dairy and eggs. Young people have a right to make informed decisions about whether to consume them.
